amendment.description: To ensure that absent uniformed services voters and overseas voters are aware of their voting rights and have a genuine opportunity to register to vote and have their absentee ballots cast and counted, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1764 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1764 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S7965-7967) To ensure that absent uniformed services voters and overseas voters are aware of their voting rights and have a genuine opportunity to register to vote and have their absentee ballots cast and counted, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1764 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1764 proposed by Senator Schumer.
